page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox add element class method
page.description: Add the CSS class to an element with the specified value.

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value defined in the a5-value attribute for the element.

argument.name: className
argument.description: CSS className to add to the element.

section.title: Example
section.example: var vbObj = {dialog.object}.getControl('MYVIEWBOX1'); //get pointer to the ViewBox vbObj.addElementClass('MA','red');
